summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Etruria Street and West Etruria Street, from Nickerson Street to 3rd Avenue West; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 88995 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
